9701.quoteText: Accounts found to violate these community standards shall be terminated

9703.quoteText:
If course instructors determine
that participants are not abiding by community standards, they may
choose to terminate their participation

9706.quoteText: The Totem platform collects the email address and password of the user upon registration with the platform, as this data is required to log into the system

tosdr.case: The service provides information about how they collect personal data

9707.quoteText:
The user can opt-in to provide optional information about gender and geographic location in their user profile.
This information will be used by Greenhost and Free Press Unlimited for reporting purposes
